name: Upgraded Cosmopolitan
description: Whatever your feelings are regarding the Cosmopolitan, it is arguably one of the most influential cocktails to come along in the past 25 years. Now, it's time for an upgrade, a re-imagined Cosmo for today's tastes.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces citrus vodka (such as Ketel One Citroen)
1/4 ounce fresh lime juice from 1 lime

recipeInstructions.text: Combine vodka, cranberry sorbet, lime juice, and Cointreau in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, top with sparkling wine, and serve.
